mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture (attachment, coursecode, name) VALUES (NULL, #{courseCode}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT l."lectureid" AS lectureId, l."name" AS name, l."attachment" AS attachment FROM public."lecture" l WHERE l."coursecode" = #{courseCode} ORDER BY l."name";
SELECT l."lectureid" AS lectureId, l."name" AS name, l."attachment" AS attachment FROM public."lecture" l WHERE l."coursecode" = #{courseCode} AND l."name" = #{lectureName}
SELECT l."lectureid" AS lectureId, l."name" AS name, l."attachment" AS attachment FROM public."lecture" l WHERE l."lectureid" = #{lectureId}
